entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING IN EFFECT, Kimmirut
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:41 AM EDT Wednesday 04 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kimmirut Airport 08:00 AM EDT Wednesday 04 May 2016

Temperature: 2.9°C

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.
